salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 to LKR 300,000+ per month during peak season, highly variable.
requiredSkills: In-depth knowledge of Sri Lankan history and culture
futureOutlook: As tourism is a key industry, licensed and knowledgeable tour guides are always in demand. Guides who can offer specialized, niche experiences (e.g., adventure, wildlife, culinary tours) and speak less common languages (e.g., Chinese, Russian) can command premium rates. The profession is heavily dependent on the stability and growth of the tourism sector.
